title: The Truth We Hide
description: Three different women. Three different secrets. Just how well do we really know those around us? And how much are we willing to risk for them?When events throw Grace, Rachel and Amanda together, the last thing each woman suspects is that the others are harboring a dark secret, just as they themselves are. Struggling to keep up appearances and battling their own particular demons, the three unlikely friends must decide just how far they are prepared to go to help one another when calamity strikes.
author: Nichola Park
